events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message indicating a return and refund desire.
The case has been assigned to the Returns Specialist team for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to assist you with the return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the condition of the jacket to proceed with your refund request?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 789456123, and the jacket is in perfect condition, never worn, just doesn't fit.
We have processed your return request. Please use the prepaid shipping label we emailed you to send the jacket back. Once we receive it, we will issue your refund promptly.
Thank you for handling this so efficiently. I will ship the jacket back today using the label provided.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
As there are no further issues reported, we will now close this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
